name: Uncontrolled TD
description:
This is a base-defense tower defense game where the towers are randomly generated, every one is unique. From pellet throwers to laser beams, penetrating shots, and life-leaching.

Click towers to view their details, showing damage, HP, experience, and special effects. Info panel has Relocate and Upgrade buttons (when blue bar is full). 

Move tower to the red hex to destroy it. Your base will advance towards making a new tower by 30 seconds.

Towers and Creeps are generated at random! Use what you got!
